mapper.sql: sid, username, tel, address, email, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from labour_day_user_info
1=1
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDay},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDay},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into labour_day_user_info
sid,
username,
tel,
address,
email,
create_time,
#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update labour_day_user_info
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update labour_day_user_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
